SELECT f.id, m.machine_code AS machine_id, submit_user, finish_user, submit_time, finish_time, status, finish_remark, remind_status, CONCAT(IFNULL(ft.name,''),' ',f.remark) AS remark FROM inno72_check_fault f LEFT JOIN inno72_check_fault_type ft ON ft.CODE = f.type LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = f.machine_id WHERE 1=1 f.status =#{status}
and ( f.submit_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )
and ( f.finish_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )
and ( m.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' or f.finish_user LIKE '%${keyword}%' or f.submit_user LIKE '%${keyword}%') ORDER BY f.submit_time DESC

SELECT f.id, m.machine_code AS machine_id, submit_user, finish_user, submit_time, finish_time, finish_remark, fr.remark AS answer, CONCAT(#{path},img.image) AS image from inno72_check_fault f LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = f.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_check_fault_remark fr ON fr.fault_id = f.id LEFT JOIN inno72_check_fault_image img ON img.fault_id = f.id WHERE f.id=#{id} ORDER BY fr.create_time
